name: Time to shoot
description:
WELCOME TO TIME TO SHOOT!

This is a small game made for the Ranged Combat game jam in less than a week. You are a blue character who was imprisoned by the Time Master. You finally got a chance to free yourself of his imprisonment, but you have a tough journey ahead of you! Luckily, you have a bunch of time bombs to help you along the way.

-- CONTROLS --

"WASD" - to move

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - to shoot bullets/arrows

RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON - to shoot time bombs

SPACE - to dash in the direction of movement

SCROLL - switch weapons

-- GAMEPLAY --

This is a roguelite type of game where you have to shoot your way thorugh a bunch of levels ending with a boss fight. The catch is that you have to shoot time bombs that freeze time around the explosion. You can heavily damage enemies while they are frozen. If the enemy isn't frozen you will deal very little damage. Every level you will have to use a different weapon (or all weapons).

-- ENEMIES --

There are two enemies in this game. The enemies with guns will shoot large pink bullets at you that deal 10 damage when they hit you. The enemies without a gun and a glowing effect will shoot red time bombs at you. If you get caught in an explosion of the time bomb you will be frozen for 2 seconds.
